document.full_text: like a desperation shot at the buzzer, three california lawmakers rolled out a bill on monday to derail efforts by the sacramento kings of the national basketball association to leave town.
document.title: bill would force kings to pay debt before packing up
lines_and_colors: like a desperation shot at the buzzer, three california lawmakers rolled out a bill on monday to derail efforts by the sacramento kings of the national basketball association to leave town.
